title: How do we know the mass of stars?
itunes:title: How do we know the mass of stars?
description:
Daniel talks about how astronomers can measure or deduce the mass of a star, and why it controls its fate.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
